AD_ZrellWaiting.synopsis: The player has killed Nightsong, making Ketheric vulnrable and causing him to retreat to the top of Moonrise. Z'rell wait's outside the entreance of Moonrise for the predicted arrival of the player (or whoever would have caused this terrible crime).
AD_ZrellWaiting.how_to_trigger: load SCL_Main_Aoe moonightsongdeath_alivego to -152; 21; -98Walk accross the bridge (but far enough away to not trigger dialog with Z'rell)Wait for ADs

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided input only includes one session ('AD_ZrellWaiting'). Since there is only a single session, no ordering constraints (such as predecessor or successor relationships) or mutual exclusivity constraints can be inferred from this data.

AD_ZrellWaiting_0.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
AD_ZrellWaiting_0.text: If so much as a rat crosses that bridge, cut its throat.

AD_ZrellWaiting_1.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
AD_ZrellWaiting_1.text: That True Soul did this. I was blind to miss the signs.

AD_ZrellWaiting_2.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
AD_ZrellWaiting_2.text: The Absolute's plan hasn't changed - not a jot. We hold the line.

AD_ZrellWaiting_3.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
AD_ZrellWaiting_3.text: I hope they at least slit that rat Balthazar from navel to nose.
